text: Is there any way to access the label property for fields?

Click it, the pencil icon means it’s editable.

When working locally, it’s the `label` property in your meta.json.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/configuration>
Ah, yeah, but I mean accessing from the design manager easily with HubL, like `{{ module.address.label }}` to return "Address" in this case.
As in you want to print the label in the module’s HTML itself?

curious what the use case is?

Generally it’s best to make all text content actually editable in the page editor.
1. makes the content changeable by content creators and more versatile.
2. makes the website localizable to other languages/regions
